job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-03T14:18:10.000Z", "description": "

Modis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity with a top Automotive company. You will be working with large data sets, and doing heavy modeling. The ideal candidate would have of 3+ years of data science experience, have worked with customer insight analytics, and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and R.

 

POSITION DESCRIPTION 

\u00b7        Build large-scale machine-learning models/pipelines

\u00b7        Maintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycle.

\u00b7        Developing metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performance

\u00b7        Translate complex quantitative analysis into business insights.

\u00b7        Collect data, perform statistical analysis, and present solutions to Product Owners/business customers.

\u00b7        Works hands on with tools such as Python, R, and SQL.

\u00b7        Define and create the next generation of data solutions.

 

TECHNICAL SKILLS DESIRED

\u00b7        3 - 5 years of Data Science experience 

\u00b7        Predictive Modelling

\u00b7        Statistical analysis

\u00b7        Python

\u00b7        R

\u00b7        SQL

\u00b7        Bachelor\u2019s degree in mathematics, data science, statistics, or computer science

\u00b7        Experience with GCP is a plus!

 

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

\u00b7        Excellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits, Paid Time Off and 401k

\u00b7        No Third-Party inquiries
